reasoning: The test reports 500 server errors from Publish and Discard API endpoints, which is a definitive bug. Additionally, workflow settings fail to persist when attempting to activate Content Approval on pages, indicating a state synchronization issue on the server side.
evidence_summary: Screenshot confirms workflow is 'Off' at page level despite attempts to enable Content Approval. Test observations document 500 errors from API endpoints and workflow settings that do not persist after being set, indicating server-side bugs rather than test methodology issues.
